plot: An irreverent, humorous, allegorical documentary about American Buddhism, religious authority, and the intersection of narcissism and transcendence.
title: Bodhisattva, Superstar
plot_es: An irreverent, humorous, allegorical documentary about American Buddhism, religious authority, and the intersection of narcissism and transcendence.
plot_en: An irreverent, humorous, allegorical documentary about American Buddhism, religious authority, and the intersection of narcissism and transcendence.
